page.title: 02Penrhyn Castle
page.content: Penrhyn Castle is 150 years old, it was built in 1820 by Thomas Hopper.He was commisioned by G.H.Dawkins Pennant.The money to build it came from the Penrhyn slate quarries near Bethesda.In 1951 the present owner of the castle Lady Janet Pennant sold it to the National Trust.The castle is now run by agents of the National Trust. Penrhyn Castle is not really a castle but built in castle form.It has 4 towers,and over the arched doorway there are sculptured faces of mythological figures.The castle's turrets,arches and fortifications make it look much older than it actually is.
